Large Pohayoh.name: Large Pohayoh
Large Pohayoh.description: Aye lad if thah ain't tha larjes' fookin' poh'ay'oh eyev evah seen wih me own eyes!

Burned Marshmallow.name: Burned Marshmallow
Burned Marshmallow.description: IMPORTANT, this bonus DOUBLES at Farming Lv 50. Triples at Farming Lv 100, and so on!

Head Chef Geustloaf.name: Head Chef Geustloaf
Head Chef Geustloaf.description: How DARE you question the honorable Chef Geustloaf's cooking abilities!

Nyanborgir.name: Nyanborgir
Nyanborgir.description: It's the greatest meal ever! Bonus DOUBLES at Summoning Lv 50, Triples at 100, etc

Sticky Bun.name: Sticky Bun
Sticky Bun.description: This frosting better be made of superglue or I'm suing for false advertising.

Seasoned Marrow.name: Seasoned Marrow
Seasoned Marrow.description: You ate all the edible stuff around the bone? Why not try the stuff inside the bone!

Yumi Peachring.name: Yumi Peachring
Yumi Peachring.description: Don't disrespect the ring. All hail the ring.

Frazzleberry.name: Frazzleberry
Frazzleberry.description: Big. Blue. Beautiful. Boing. Boat. Broom. Balls. Backgammon. Bort.

Misterloin Steak.name: Misterloin Steak
Misterloin Steak.description: Make sure to paint on the grill marks to really give it that extra taste!

Plumpcakes.name: Plumpcakes
Plumpcakes.description: Ohhh, they're called 'plump'cakes because they're dummy thicc can I get an amen!
